name: YourMarketingDepartment
0:
”Alexa, open your marketing department”
”Alexa, ask your marketing department for the latest update”
”Alexa, start your marketing department”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your marketing department
des: Listen to the latest blogs posts from Your Marketing Department. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
